amendment.description: To clarify that the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Court has the authority to determine and enforce compliance with any order or rule of, or procedure approved by, such Court.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3920 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3920 proposed by Senator Whitehouse to Amendment SA 3911. (consideration: CR S564-568; text: CR S564) To clarify that the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Court has the authority to determine and enforce compliance with any order or rule of, or procedure approved by, such Court.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3920 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3920 proposed by Senator Whitehouse to Amendment SA 3911.
